title: Strawberry tart
ingredients: ['For the custard filling', '25g cornflour', '500ml milk', '50g caster sugar', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract (or 1/2 fresh vanilla pod)', '1 egg', '2 egg yolks', 'For the tart', '1 (375g) shortcrust pastry sheet', '500g fresh strawberries', '2 tablespoons apricot jam, to glaze']
